channel.title: Quotidian on Marlow's Listener
channel.description: Recent content in Quotidian on Marlow's Listener

item.title: Thou Should Nots
item.description: Don’t listen to the voice that says go for it! Don’t ignore the voice that says you’ll be sorry Don’t focus on your failures, you can always find new ways of screwing up Don’t expect it to be different this time Don’t worry about tomorrow, you’ll know it when it comes
